CO1.COURSE: Discuss the basic concepts of meta-learning, for few-shot classification and other purposes.
CO1.DESCRIPTION: Implement the simplest meta-learning algorithms for few-shot classification.

CO2.COURSE: Explain the core problem in machine-leearning of out-of-distribution generalization, causality vis correlation, and the role of meta-learning and related approaches towards addressing this.
CO2.DESCRIPTION: Apply meta-learning to practical problems via examples taken from e-commerce, advertising and finance.

CO3.COURSE: Explain how logical inductive biases via meta-interpretive learning could serve as alternative means to achieve some of the goals of meta-learning

CO4.COURSE: Meta-Learning for Transfer, Concept-drift, Continual learning and Reinforcement Learning

Weekly Lecture Plan.Lecture Topic: Meta-Learning for Transfer, Concept-drift, Continual learning and Reinforcement Learning
Learning from almost No Data: Meta-interpretive Program Synthesis
Selected applications of Meta-learning in E-commerce, Advertising and Finance
